sentences.en: Aa parka and a warm waterproof coat made by the Inuit natives from animal skins.
sentences.cn: 美洲因纽特人用动物皮毛制成的皮制大衣或保暖防水衣.

sentences.en: All the actors and crewmembers in the film are Inuit Indians.
sentences.cn: 所有的演员和剧组人员都是因纽特印第安人.

sentences.en: But a warming climate brings many problems for the Inuit.
sentences.cn: 不可预料的冰海对人们的生活是至关重要的.

sentences.en: Drunk as a dog,'the Inuit like to say.
sentences.cn: “因纽特人总是喜欢说:‘醉得像狗一样.

sentences.en: He pays heed to the observations of the Inuit.
sentences.cn: 他留意到因纽特人的观察结果.

sentences.en: However , the Inuit peoples who inhabit the island generally live at coastal trading posts.
sentences.cn: 岛上居住的因纽特人的生计基本上来源于海边的贸易点.

sentences.en: Inuit have traditionally been hunters and fishery.
sentences.cn: 因纽特人传统上多是以捕鱼和打猎为主.

sentences.en: InuIt'skin the animals they hunt to use their fur.
sentences.cn: 因纽特人将猎得的动物剥皮,获取它们的皮毛.

sentences.en: The involvement of the Inuit is crucial also because alterations brought on by climate change increase the chances of intervention in their lifestyle - impossible a decade ago.
sentences.cn: 因纽特人的参与之所以至关重要，还因为气候变化带来的改变增加了他们的生活方式受到干扰的可能性——这在十年前是不可能的。

sentences.en: The singular of Inuit is Inuk.
sentences.cn: Inuit（依努依特人）的单数形式是Inuk。

sentences.en: These collect in the tissues of wildlife and the local Inuit people.
sentences.cn: 这些污染物聚集在野生动物和当地爱斯基摩人的机体组织中.

sentences.en: Two factors, however, may boost Inuit bargaining power.
sentences.cn: 但是有两个因素能够增加因纽特人的底气.

sentences.en: Whale meat, especially the vitamin C - rich skin, is an essential 5 part of the Inuit diet.
sentences.cn: 鲸鱼肉(特别是富含维他命C的鲸鱼皮)是因纽特人饮食中不可或缺的部分.

sentences.en: Whales have long been central part of Inuit life in Greenland, where a regulated subsistence hunt continues to this day.
sentences.cn: 在格陵兰，猎鲸是长期以来因纽特人生活的中心内容，在那里，受规管的自给狩猎一直持续至今。

sentences.en: Whether they catch a male or female narwhal, the Inuit waste nothing.
sentences.cn: 不论猎捕到公角鲸或母角鲸, 因纽特人绝不浪费丝毫可用之物.

sentences.en: Yeah, well, he's going there to teach the Inuit population, who suffer from high illiteracy.
sentences.cn: 是的.他是去给深受文盲之苦的因纽特人教书.

trans.tran_cn: 因纽特人的，因纽特语的
因纽特人（北美的爱斯基摩人），因纽特语
trans.tran_en: The Inuit are the people descended from the original people of Alaska, Eastern Canada, and Greenland
